overview.title: How Faxi Works
overview.subtitle: Simple steps to connect your fax machine to the internet

register.title: 1. Register Your Fax Number
register.description: Sign up online and register your fax machine number. Your fax number becomes your email address.

send.title: 2. Send a Fax
send.description: Write your request and send it to 050-5050-8899 (Japan) or 1-302-400-8899 (USA). Use checkmarks, circles, or simple handwriting.

process.title: 3. AI Processes Your Request
process.description: Our AI reads your fax, understands your intent, and connects to the appropriate service.

receive.title: 4. Receive Confirmation
receive.description: Get a confirmation fax back with details of your completed request.

overview.exampleDescription: Here are some examples of how to format your faxes for different services

useCases.title: What You Can Do with Faxi
useCases.subtitle: Simple solutions for everyday needs—all by fax

email.title: Email Family & Friends
email.story: Imagine writing a letter to your daughter who lives across the country, and having it arrive in her inbox within seconds. With Faxi, your fax number becomes your email address. Write a note, send a fax, and she gets an email. When she replies, it arrives back as a fax. Your address book is saved, so you never have to remember email addresses.
steps: Family receives email instantly—replies come back as fax
email.highlight: I send my grandchildren drawings by fax and they email me photos back. It's like magic!

healthcare.title: Book Doctor Appointments
healthcare.story: No more waiting on hold or struggling with online booking systems. Write down your preferred date and time, send a fax, and receive confirmation within minutes. Need to reschedule? Just send another fax.
steps: Receive confirmation with your appointment details
healthcare.highlight: I booked my check-up while having morning tea. The confirmation came back before I finished my cup.

shopping.title: Shop Online by Fax
shopping.story: Want to order from Amazon or other online stores but can't access their websites? Just fax us what you're looking for—be as general or specific as you like. We'll send back matching products with prices. Circle what you want, fax it back, and it arrives at your door.
steps: Receive options by fax—circle your choices and send back
shopping.highlight: I ordered birthday presents for all my grandchildren without asking anyone for help.

government.title: Get Local Information
government.story: Need to know the garbage collection schedule? Want to find senior programs at your community center? Looking for a government form? Just ask by fax. We'll send you the information you need—schedules, forms, local events, municipal announcements, and more.
steps: We find the information for you
Receive answers, forms, or schedules by fax
government.highlight: I found out about a free health check at my local community center. I would have missed it without Faxi.

aiChat.title: Ask Anything
aiChat.story: Have a question? Want to know the weather forecast, a recipe, or what time the store closes? Write it down, fax it, and get a detailed answer back. It's like having a helpful assistant available 24/7.
steps: Receive a detailed answer by fax
aiChat.highlight: I asked for advice on caring for my orchids and received helpful instructions within minutes.

cost.question: How much does Faxi cost?
cost.answer: Basic service is ¥980/month including unlimited fax processing. Premium features like priority processing and advanced services are ¥1,980/month.

setup.question: Is it difficult to set up?
setup.answer: No setup required on your fax machine. Simply register online with your fax number and start sending faxes to our service number.

accuracy.question: How accurate is the handwriting recognition?
accuracy.answer: Our AI achieves over 90% accuracy on handwritten text. If the AI is unsure, we'll send a clarification fax asking for confirmation.

security.question: Is my information secure?
security.answer: Yes. All faxes are encrypted during transmission and processing. We comply with Japanese privacy laws and never share your data without permission.

support.question: What if I need help?
support.answer: We offer phone support in Japanese during business hours (9am-6pm). You can also send a fax with your question and we'll respond by fax.

services.question: What services are supported?
services.answer: Currently we support email communication with family, healthcare appointments, online shopping, government services, and AI-powered information assistance. We're constantly adding new services based on user needs.
